Home is where the pub is

This project explores the relationship between football clubs and pubs, specifically the home pubs. For fans, there�s no better feeling than walking into a pub that�s drenched in their team�s memorabilia, surrounded by fans creating feeling of community and belonging. One thing brings these people together: the love for their team. � Focusing on 12 London teams, ranging from the Premier League to League Two, this project celebrates the places fans can find sanctuary before and after the game. Displaying beer mats, bottles and a scrapbook to create the familiar environment of a pub, here�s to these pubs and their clubs.
